Weapons.Name: Steel Sword
Weapons.Description: A sword for the experienced adventurer.

Weapons.Name: Mythril Sword
Weapons.Description: A sword that has seen many battles.

Weapons.Name: Knight's Vow
Weapons.Description: Once belonging to a knight of legends. Said to have been lost.

Weapons.Name: Oak Longbow
Weapons.Description: A beautiful longbow made of luxurious Oak.

Weapons.Name: Willow Longbow
Weapons.Description: Beautiful longbow made of willow. Trusted by many rangers.

Weapons.Name: Magic Bow
Weapons.Description: A bow infused with magic. Legends say it never misses.

Weapons.Name: Robin Hoood
Weapons.Description: Signature bow of Robin Hood. Sought after by rangers worldwide.

Weapons.Name: Oak Staff
Weapons.Description: Reliable staff and perfect for the new wizard.

Weapons.Name: Willow Staff
Weapons.Description: A sturdy staff humming with power. Made from willow.

Weapons.Name: Adamantine Staff
Weapons.Description: A staff worthy of the best wizards. Made by several master craftsmans.

Weapons.Name: Demon's Grimroire
Weapons.Description: Book bound in leather as dark as night. Exudes a suffocating aura.

Weapons.Name: Wooden stick
Weapons.Description: Yeaaaa, you're probably going to die.

Armor.Name: Guardian's Mail
Armor.Description: Armor worn by the Gods. Said to have been lost for centuries.

Armor.Name: Ranger's Robe
Armor.Description: Standard cloak given to rangers starting their journey.

Armor.Name: Memories of Legolas
Armor.Description: Cloak worn by the legendary marksman Legolas.

Armor.Name: Cloth Robe
Armor.Description: Offers little protection. Looks cool though.

Armor.Name: Linen Robe
Armor.Description: Linen robe infused with magic throughout its threads.

Armor.Name: Golden Fleece
Armor.Description: Robe made of rare golden fleece. Brimming with power.

Armor.Name: Phoenix Plume
Armor.Description: Strikingly beautiful crimson red cloak, said to have been woven by the Gods.

Armor.Name: Wooden Buckler
Armor.Description: A round piece of wood. Came from a barrel or something.

Armor.Name: Steel Buckeler
Armor.Description: Small steel shield for the agile warrior.

Armor.Name: Steel Kiteshield
Armor.Description: Large steel shield used frequenctly by knights.

Armor.Name: Hylian Shield
Armor.Description: This shouldn't belong in this game but here it is.

Health Potions.Name: Rations
Health Potions.Description: Variety of preserved foods fit for traveling.

Health Potions.Name: Rotten apple
Health Potions.Description: I wouldn't if I were you.

Mana Potions.Name: Stale Ale
Mana Potions.Description: I forgot I had this but its better than nothing.

Mana Potions.Name: Bottle of wine
Mana Potions.Description: Bottle of expensive looking wine. Might as well!

Mana Potions.Name: Rotten juice
Mana Potions.Description: It doesn't even flow out of the flask.
